<title level="1" pfs="">[Anadi Fateweaver](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1608)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

The anadis manipulate the threads of fate as easily as they spin silk.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 22

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 20

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 17
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Anadi_Fateweaver.png" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 5">[Anadi Fateweaver](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1608)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="NG" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Anadi" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=255" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #169: Kindled Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=94) pg. 79</row>

**Perception** +14

**Languages**
[Anadi](/Languages.aspx?ID=46), [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +13, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +11, [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4) +9, [Medicine](/Skills.aspx?ID=9) +12, [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10) +14, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +12

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +2

**Dex** +4

**Con** +0

**Int** +0

**Wis** +5

**Cha** +1
</row>

**Items**
[Composite Shortbow](/Weapons.aspx?ID=75) (20 arrows), [Hide Armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=7), [Shortsword](/Weapons.aspx?ID=43)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 21 

**Fort** +9 

**Ref** +12 

**Will** +15 

</row>

**HP** 75

**Fate's Threads** <actions string="Reaction" /> ([fortune](/Traits.aspx?ID=76)) **Frequency** three times per day; **Trigger** An ally within 30 feet of the anadi fateweaver that they can see makes a skill check or a saving throw; **Effect** The creature rerolls the triggering check and takes the new result.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet, climb 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="" />
fangs +13 ([Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179)),
**Damage** 2d6+6 plus anadi venom

**Melee**
<actions string="" />
shortsword +13 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)),
**Damage** 1d6+6 piercing

**Ranged**
<actions string="" />
composite shortbow +13 ([deadly d10](/Traits.aspx?ID=174), [Propulsive](/Traits.aspx?ID=191), [range increment 60 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [reload 0](/Traits.aspx?ID=254)),
**Damage** 1d6+1 piercing

**Arcane Spontaneous Spells** DC 23, attack +15
- **Cantrips (3rd)**
[Daze](/Spells.aspx?ID=61), [Ghost Sound](/Spells.aspx?ID=132), [Produce Flame](/Spells.aspx?ID=236), [Shield](/Spells.aspx?ID=280)
- **1st**
[Illusory Object](/Spells.aspx?ID=160), [Magic Missile](/Spells.aspx?ID=180), [Ray of Enfeeblement](/Spells.aspx?ID=244) (3 slots)
- **2nd**
[Augury](/Spells.aspx?ID=15), [Invisibility](/Spells.aspx?ID=164), [Status](/Spells.aspx?ID=308) (3 slots)
- **3rd**
[Hypnotic Pattern](/Spells.aspx?ID=157), [Mind Reading](/Spells.aspx?ID=194) (2 slots)

**Arcane Innate Spells** DC 23
- **Cantrips (3rd)**
[Dancing Lights](/Spells.aspx?ID=58), [Detect Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=66), [Mage Hand](/Spells.aspx?ID=177), [Message](/Spells.aspx?ID=190)
- **1st**
[Color Spray](/Spells.aspx?ID=44), [Mending](/Spells.aspx?ID=189), [Unseen Servant](/Spells.aspx?ID=352)
- **2nd**
[Blur](/Spells.aspx?ID=28), [Web](/Spells.aspx?ID=374)

**Rituals** DC 23

- **3rd**
[Arcane Weaving](/Rituals.aspx?ID=49)

**Anadi Venom**  ([Poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126)) **Saving Throw** DC 20 Fortitude; **Maximum Duration** 4 rounds; **Stage 1** 1d6 poison damage and [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) (1 round); **Stage 2** 1d6 poison damage, flat-footed, and [clumsy 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=3) (1 round)

**Change Shape** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Arcane](/Traits.aspx?ID=11), [Concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32), [Polymorph](/Traits.aspx?ID=127), [Transmutation](/Traits.aspx?ID=157)) The anadi changes into their hybrid, spider, or human form. The above statistics assume the anadi is in hybrid form. While in human form, the anadi seeker loses their climb Speed and can't use their fangs attack. When in spider form, they can't use weapons.

**Spin Silk**  ([Concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32), [Exploration](/Traits.aspx?ID=66), [Manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=104)) By spending several minutes, an anadi can produce silk to craft items made of cloth. An anadi can produce enough silk in a day to craft a single garment.

</column>
